title: Value
description:
The underlying base class for all values.

The important subclasses here are the ones inheriting from 'KiaraValue', as those are registered in the data
registry.

id.title: Id
id.description: A unique id for this value.

is_constant.title: Is Constant
is_constant.description: Whether this value is a constant.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Description of how/where the value was set.

last_update.title: Last Update
last_update.description: The time the last update to this value happened.

is_streaming.title: Is Streaming
is_streaming.description: Whether the value is currently streamed into this object.

is_set.title: Is Set
is_set.description: Whether the value was set (in some way: user input, default, constant...).

value_hash.title: Value Hash
value_hash.description: The hash of the current value.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata relating to the actual data (size, no. of rows, etc. -- depending on data type).

ValueSchema.title: ValueSchema
ValueSchema.description:
The schema of a value.

The schema contains the [ValueType][kiara.data.values.ValueType] of a value, as well as an optional default that
will be used if no user input was given (yet) for a value.

For more complex container types like arrays, tables, unions etc, types can also be configured with values from the ``type_config`` field.

type_config.title: Type Config
type_config.description: Configuration for the type, in case it's complex.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: Whether this value is required (True), or whether 'None' value is allowed (False).

doc.title: Doc
doc.description: A description for the value of this input field.
